tool_description: Super fast API to retrieve NPR news in an organized fashion.
name: NPR News Live
title: NPR News Live

api_list.name: Get A Specific Subsection from a Section
api_list.description: Returns news from a specified subsection of news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/health/your-health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{topicid}/{topicsectionid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get A Specific Section of News
api_list.description: Returns all the news from a specified section, choosing from national, world, politics, business, science, health, and race.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/science"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Current NPR News
api_list.description: Returns ALL current NPR news from every section and subsection that would be available on NPR's website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://npr-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"
